data.name: Company Mission Vision and Core Values
data.description: The company Mission Vision and Core Values. The project require to align with the overall company goals and objectives. The core values, vision and company mission in its objective and goals not contradict the core values and should add value to these company values.

data.name: Functional Requirements Specification
data.description: Detailed functional requirements document covering system behavior and capabilities

templateData.content:
# Functional Requirements Specification

## Document Information
**Project:** {{projectName}}
**Version:** {{version}}
**Date:** {{date}}
**Author:** {{author}}

## Executive Summary

## System Overview

## Functional Requirements

### User Interface Requirements
- **FR-UI-001:** The system shall provide a responsive web interface
- **FR-UI-002:** The system shall support multiple browser types

### Data Management Requirements
- **FR-DM-001:** The system shall store and retrieve user data
- **FR-DM-002:** The system shall maintain data integrity

### Security Requirements
- **FR-SEC-001:** The system shall authenticate users
- **FR-SEC-002:** The system shall encrypt sensitive data

### Performance Requirements
- **FR-PERF-001:** The system shall respond within 2 seconds
- **FR-PERF-002:** The system shall support 1000 concurrent users
templateData.aiInstructions: Generate comprehensive functional requirements following IEEE standards with clear system behavior specifications

data.name: User Stories Template
data.description: Comprehensive template for creating user stories with acceptance criteria

templateData.content:
# User Stories

## Project Overview
**Project:** {{projectName}}
**Type:** {{projectType}}
**Description:** {{description}}

## User Story Format
Each user story follows the format: "As a [user type], I want [functionality] so that [benefit]."

## Epic: Core Functionality

### User Registration and Authentication
- **US001:** As a new user, I want to create an account so that I can access the system
- **US002:** As a registered user, I want to log in securely so that I can access my personal data
- **US003:** As a user, I want to reset my password so that I can regain access if I forget it
templateData.aiInstructions: Generate comprehensive user stories following agile best practices with clear acceptance criteria
